thread.title: Duh, Moby Will Decline Trump Inaugural Ball Offer
thread.title_full: Duh, Moby Will Decline Trump Inaugural Ball Offer

author: Peter Helman
title: Duh, Moby Will Decline Trump Inaugural Ball Offer
text:
Peter Helman @_peterhelman | January 9, 2017 - 7:36 pm Share < br />this article: CREDIT: Jimi Celeste/Getty 
After calling Donald Trump an “ actual sociopath ,”“ a dim-witted, racist misogynist ,” and “ the worst president our country has ever, ever, seen ,” Moby was apparently asked to play at Trump’s inauguration, an event that’s already being blessed by a roster of A-list talent including America’s Got Talent runner-up Jackie Evancho , Big & Rich, and Cowboy Troy. Unsurprisingly, he said no. 
Moby revealed the news on Instagram, joking that he would DJ at the inaugural ball if Trump released his tax returns. He also suggested that his playlist would include Public Enemy and Karlheinz Stockhausen remixes: A photo posted by moby XⓋX (@moby) on Jan 9, 2017 at 8:52am PST 
Billboard asked Moby for an actual hypothetical playlist, and he assembled one that features Public Enemy, Rage Against The Machine, Sex Pistols, Kendrick Lamar, Gil-Scott Heron, Billie Holiday, and more. Listen below.
